attributes.action: Force ofgem to abolish all standing charges on gas and electricity
attributes.additional_details: the government to force ofgem to scrap all standing charges on energy bills while the crisis is ongoing and order a review into the abolition of standing charges, it is an unfair poll tax on the people of this country and we deserve a energy sector that looks out for the consumers and not the directors and their interests.
attributes.background: We the people have been effectively cast aside during the cost of living crisis. The cost of food and bills have skyrocketed none more so than the cost of energy a typical user will see £300 a year in standing charges added to their bills that before the privilege of even using it We are calling on

rejection.details:
Decisions about standing charges are a matter for utility providers and Ofgem, not the UK Government or Parliament.

The price cap is a cap on a unit of gas and electricity, with standing charges taken into account. Find out more about the energy price cap, including how it includes standing charges, here: https://www.ofgem.gov.uk/check-if-energy-price-cap-affects-you
